name: Buddy DAO
additional_notices: The smart-contract owner can mint new tokens, please proceed with caution.

description.en: Buddy DAO aims to be the first guarantor based DeFi lending protocol. As part of the mission to build a Decentral bank where everyone can get a loan in seconds.
